reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's striking pattern and find it beautifully made, with one mentioning it's perfect for a mardi gras ball.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: Beautiful!! It‚Äôs perfect for galas. It was the perfect length, I‚Äôm 5‚Äô8‚Äù and I had on heels. It‚Äôs stretchy so it is form fitting. The sequins were secure, didn‚Äôt lose any in transit or while wearing. I wore the dress for a few hours and it was comfortable, pretty light and breathable. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress for the Price
items.body: Beautiful, just as pictured. Fit great and made well Read more
items.author: Kimberly Gray

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW Factor
items.body: Awesome dress. Fits comfortable and has some give in the fabric. length was good with 3 1/2 heels at 5‚Äô4. Built in bra a plus. Dress is stunning. Read more
items.author: PattyPags

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, but it runs small, and be cautious with the zipper
items.body: A beautiful sequin dress, but it runs so much small especially in the waist and hip area. Also, the zipper was difficult to manage. I was so afraid that it would tear on me. There was no chemical smell. Price was fairly reasonable. Because of the size and zipper I had to return it. Read more
items.author: MizAnn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy Dress
items.body: This dress exceeded all my expectations‚Äîexcellent quality, gorgeous detailing, and a flawless fit! I sized up one size and it turned out perfectly. Truly a stunning piece! Read more
items.author: Tonya Groce

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dress is not good quality
items.author: Michele R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy
items.body: I fit like a glove it looks high quality and good stretchy material but now see through i wore it to a gala and got so many compliments great buy for way less definitely recommend wasa little long for me im 5"1 and weigh 125 so it was great for my shape had to lift the bottom a little so I wouldn't fall but that's an easy fix witj higher heels or hem the bottom Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress poor quality zipper
items.body: This is a beautiful dress but the zip is very poor quality. I could not use the zipper on the dress. I looked amazing in the dress. The zipper not working was a big inconvenience. Read more
items.author: Clarence R Riggs

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Formal Maxi Evening One Shoulder Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Mermaid Formal Maxi Evening One Shoulder Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gold, Black-curve, Black-gold, Blue, Apricot-pattern, Black6, Blue6, Black, Black-multicolored, Green6, Purple6, Blacksilver-leaf, Purple-multicolored, Apricot6. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
